Container.Name: mumble-server
Container.Overview:
This is a Docker container for running Murmur, the server for the Mumble voice-over-ip client. A simple mumble-server with ini file, log, and db in your control.
Unraid Run Example: docker run --name mumble-server -d -- restart=always --net=bridge -p 64738:64738 -p 64738:64738/udp -v /mnt/disks/DataDisk/data/murmur/:/data -t coppit/mumble-server

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: Host path to store Murmur database, ini and, log files.
